secondaries.shortDescription: Select one BLOOD ANGELS CHARACTER from your army, one CHARACTER from the opponent's one. Score 5 if enemy model is destroyed, 5 more if it was at the result of a melee attack, 5 more if it was from your target model

subObjectives.description: Enemy model is destroyed by a melee attack
Enemy model is destroyed by your targeted unit
All three conditions are satisfied... Your oponent loose 1 CP

secondaries.shortDescription: Score 3 if 1 enemy unit was destryoed by a DEATH COMPANY unit. 4 if it's 2+ instead. Score 1 more if 1+ DEATH COMPANY units were destryoed by opponent this turn

subObjectives.description: 1 Enemy Unit was destroyed by a DEATH COMPANY this battle round
One of your DEATH COMPANY unit has been destroyed by the enemy

secondaries.shortDescription: At the end of your turn, score 3 victory points if any enemy units were destroyed by a BLOOD ANGELS unit from your army that was set up on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of any of your Movement phases during the battle. If any of those enemy units were destroyed in the same turn in which that BLOOD ANGELS unit was set up, score 1 additional victory point. If any of those enemy units were CHARACTER units, score 1 additional victory point.

subObjectives.description: any enemy units were destroyed by a BLOOD ANGELS unit from your army that was set up on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of any of your Movement phases during the battle.
If any of those enemy units were destroyed in the same turn in which that BLOOD ANGELS unit was set up, score 1 additional victory point.
If any of those enemy units were CHARACTER units, score 1 additional victory point.

secondaries.shortDescription: At the end of your turn, score 4 victory points if there are more BLOOD ANGELS units from your army in your opponent’s deployment zone than there are enemy units in your deployment zone.

subObjectives.description: there are more BLOOD ANGELS units from your army in your opponent’s deployment zone than there are enemy units in your deployment zone.
